title: VANAHA BY SHAPOORJI
detail: Shapoorji Vanaha offers a harmonious blend of luxury and nature with its diverse range of 1, 2, 3, and 4 BHK residences. Each home is meticulously designed to enhance your living experience, featuring modern modular kitchens, advanced climate control systems, and elegant glass partitions. Enjoy expansive private balconies, lush landscaped gardens, and a host of exclusive amenities including a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pool, and recreational areas. At Shapoorji Vanaha, every detail is crafted to provide a serene and sophisticated living environment where comfort meets natural beauty.
developer_detail: Shapoorji, with a legacy spanning over 150 years, isn't just a builder; they are architects of dreams, constructing not just homes but fulfilling lifestyles. Their commitment to quality is evident in their iconic projects, which have become synonymous with luxury and innovation. From state-of-the-art residential towers to sprawling townships, Shapoorji Pallonji offers a diverse portfolio that caters to every aspiration.
city_description: Bavdhan, a rapidly growing residential suburb nestled in the western part of Pune, India, is emerging as a sought-after haven for homebuyers and investors alike. Its allure stems from its picturesque setting, enveloped by rolling hills on three sides and the serene Pashan Lake to the north.
